name: My SBT19
description:
This SBT confirms successful completion of the Season 2 checklist and receipt of the official airdrop.
 Holders verified that they:
1. Participated in Season 2 surprise token drops 
 2. Met all activity requirements (daily logins, partner game plays, event entries)  
3. Qualified for and claimed their Season 2 rewards 
 
As an immutable badge of your engagement, this SBT grants you recognition within the TON Station community and unlocks early access to future drop-related benefits.
